Function to return either normal, lognormal, or non-parametric distribution.

Function to return either normal, lognormal, or non-parametric distribution.

est_dist(df, alpha = 0.05, method = "sw", choices = c("norm", "lnorm"),
  group_by_location = FALSE, keep_data_object = FALSE)

Arguments

df

groundwater data frame in tidy format
alpha

alpha
method

default is "sw"
choices

vector of distributions to check. Default is c("norm, "lnorm")
group_by_location

TRUE/FALSE to estimate distribution by individual location, or grouped together. Default is FALSE.
keep_data_object

Default is FALSE

Examples

data("gw_data")
wells <- c("MW-1", "MW-2", "MW-3", "MW-4")
params <- c("Sulfate, total",
            "Arsenic, dissolved",
           "Boron, dissolved")

gw_data <- gw_data %>%
filter(location_id %in% wells, param_name %in% params) %>%
percent_lt() %>%
filter(percent_lt <=15)

gw_data %>%
group_by(location_id, param_name, default_unit) %>%
est_dist(., alpha = 0.05, keep_data_object = FALSE)
#> # A tibble: 12 x 4
#>    location_id         param_name default_unit  distribution
#>          <chr>              <chr>        <chr>         <chr>
#>  1        MW-2     Sulfate, total         mg/L     Lognormal
#>  2        MW-2 Arsenic, dissolved         ug/L Nonparametric
#>  3        MW-2   Boron, dissolved         mg/L        Normal
#>  4        MW-1     Sulfate, total         mg/L        Normal
#>  5        MW-1 Arsenic, dissolved         ug/L Nonparametric
#>  6        MW-1   Boron, dissolved         mg/L Nonparametric
#>  7        MW-3     Sulfate, total         mg/L        Normal
#>  8        MW-3 Arsenic, dissolved         ug/L Nonparametric
#>  9        MW-3   Boron, dissolved         mg/L        Normal
#> 10        MW-4     Sulfate, total         mg/L Nonparametric
#> 11        MW-4 Arsenic, dissolved         ug/L        Normal
#> 12        MW-4   Boron, dissolved         mg/L        Normal


gw_data %>%
group_by(param_name, default_unit) %>%
est_dist(., group_by_location = TRUE, keep_data_object = FALSE)
#> # A tibble: 3 x 3
#>           param_name default_unit  distribution
#>                <chr>        <chr>         <chr>
#> 1     Sulfate, total         mg/L        Normal
#> 2 Arsenic, dissolved         ug/L Nonparametric
#> 3   Boron, dissolved         mg/L Nonparametric
